Trump visiting Arizona to mark milestone of 200 miles of border wall construction President Trump is heading to Arizona on Tuesday to spotlight his administration's completion of the 200th mile of border wall construction along the nation’s southern boundary with Mexico.

Steve Hilton: Why a second Trump term is so important The bureaucracy, the establishment media, the Democrats, never-Trump Republicans, John Bolton with his book are all desperate to show that Trump was a one-off, short-term event, a historical aberration.
